summary: 今日焦点集中于三大方向：一是大模型工程能力突破，如Qwen3 Coder高效处理长文档、Llama 3.1推理性能飙升；二是AI在医疗与专业场景的深度落地，包括临床症状检测、专科推理评估等论文；三是基础研究新发现，如“困惑度悖论”揭示代码与数学在提示中的压缩差异，为模型训练提供新视角。

news.title: Qwen3 Coder Next 8FP in the process of converting the entire Flutter documentation for 12 hours now with just 3 sentence prompt with 64K max tokens at around 102GB memory (out of 128GB)...
news.comment: Qwen3 Coder Next 8FP实现64K上下文下12小时无损转换Flutter全量文档，突破大模型长文本处理极限，里程碑式进展

news.title: Free ASIC Llama 3.1 8B inference at 16,000 tok/s - no, not a joke
news.comment: Free ASIC推理达16k tokens/s，突破性性能验证，标志边缘AI硬件新纪元

news.title: 谷歌夺回王座：Gemini 3.1 Pro来了！姚顺宇：后面还有更好的
news.comment: Gemini 3.1 Pro发布，姚顺宇提及后续更强版本，暗示多模态与推理能力显著提升，属行业里程碑事件

news.title: Towards Efficient Constraint Handling in Neural Solvers for Routing Problems
news.comment: 首个通用高效神经路由约束处理框架CaR提出，解决硬约束难题，具实用价值

news.title: Optimization Instability in Autonomous Agentic Workflows for Clinical Symptom Detection
news.comment: 首次系统揭示自主代理工作流中的优化不稳定现象，临床诊断场景下警示性极强

news.title: How Uncertain Is the Grade? A Benchmark of Uncertainty Metrics for LLM-Based Automatic Assessment
news.comment: LLM自动评估中不确定性度量的系统性基准研究，对教育AI可靠性至关重要

news.title: Evidence-Grounded Subspecialty Reasoning: Evaluating a Curated Clinical Intelligence Layer on the 2025 Endocrinology Board-Style Examination
news.comment: 首个证据增强型专科推理系统在权威考试中超越前沿LLM，标志临床AI向可解释性跃升

news.title: Improving Interactive In-Context Learning from Natural Language Feedback
news.comment: 提出将交互式上下文学习作为可训练技能，推动LLM从静态知识向动态反馈适应演进

news.title: GPSBench: Do Large Language Models Understand GPS Coordinates?
news.comment: 首个系统性评估LLM地理坐标推理能力的基准数据集发布，填补关键研究空白。

news.title: The Perplexity Paradox: Why Code Compresses Better Than Math in LLM Prompts
news.comment: 首次系统验证LLM中代码与推理的压缩差异，提出perplexity paradox机制，具实用价值
